full_text: The world is already experiencing increasingly erratic weather, including stronger storms and more unpredictable rainfall patterns, leading to deluges in some places and droughts in others https://t.co/83I4Rk5drF

localize.full_text: 世界ではすでに、より強い嵐や予測不可能な降雨パターンなど、不安定な天候が増えており、ある場所では洪水、別の場所では干ばつが発生しています。https://t.co/83I4Rk5drF
